NOVEL PHASE TRANSITION IN NON-ANTIFERRObIAGNETICALLY ORDERED CRYSTALS OF La2Cu04
S-W. Cheong, Z. Flsk, J. O. Willis, S. E. Brown, J. D. Thompson,
J. P. RemeikaN, A. S. Coopers, R. M. Aikin, D. Schiferl, and C. Cruner~-~
Los Alamos National Laboratory,
Los Alamos, NM 87545
~AT&T Bell Laboratories, Murray Hill, NJ 07974
~O~Also at
UCtA, Department of Physics and Solid State Science Center,
Los Angeles, CA 90024
( Received 6 October 1987 by G. Burns )
We report the discovery of a new phase diagram in the magnetic field-
temperature plane for single crystals oÂ£ La2Cu04 that show no sign of
antiferromagnetic order.
The phase boundary is defined by magneto-
resistance and sucseptibility
measurements. We discuss several possibi-
lities
that may lead to the phase diagram observed.
